newsitem.title: DENMARK: Olicom sees Copenhagen listing this autumn.
newsitem.headline: Olicom sees Copenhagen listing this autumn.

text.p: Danish data and electronics company Olicom A/S, already listed on the U.S. Nasdaq exchange, said on Wednesday that it hoped to make its Danish bourse debut this year.
"We would like it to happen during the autumn but I cannot say when exactly," managing director Lars Stig Nielsen said, adding that the Danish listing would not necessitate any further stock issue.
The company on Wednesday reported second quarter 1997 profit after tax of around 5.1 million Danish crowns and turnover up 40 percent, compared to the same period last year, to 654 million.
